title: Platinum 5s ladder team looking for Gold+ players!

embed.description: Qualtrics sophisticated online survey software solutions make creating online surveys easy. Learn more about Research Suite and get a free account today.

body:
Platinum 5s ladder team looking for 2 new players in Top, ADC and Support positions.

Must be from Australia or New Zealand, Gold+ in solo queue and able to communicate in English. ADC/Support pairs are preferred, but not essential.

Please fill out this quick link to apply: https://qtrial2014az1.az1.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_23GHp3i2KHxRFxH
(please note that ADC and Support pairs will only need to fil out one form)

Regards,
Mackenzie (systemplayerlost)
